resources.string: Activate Sleep Pill Bluetooth Low Energy

To begin, you must activate Bluetooth Low Energy mode on your Sleep Pill. To do this, place your Sleep Pill in the tray that it came in with your Sense. The Hello logo should be face-down on the tray, and the grey hinge should line up with the indent in the tray slot. Leave in place for 10 seconds, then remove it. Your pill should be discoverable for 5 minutes after this.

If you do not have the tray, you can place a magnet over the Hello logo for 10 seconds.

After you‘ve done this, press next.
